user_query: I want to plan a golf weekend with my friends and we need to find some courses to play. Can you provide us with a list of golf courses within a 10-mile radius of our location? It would be great if you could also give us the details of a specific course, like Pebble Beach Golf Links, including its address, phone number, rating, and website. Additionally, we would like to see the driver standings for the 2020 Formula 1 season.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of golf courses within a 10-mile radius of the user's location.
Get details of a specific golf course, Pebble Beach Golf Links, including address, phone number, rating, and website.
Fetch the driver standings for the 2020 Formula 1 season.
